components.bl

Class BusinessComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • components.bl.BusinessComponent
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DataProviderBusinessComponent, SQLBusinessComponent

    public class BusinessComponent
extends Object
    BusinessComponent Base class for Business Components that connect to a UI component

        BBjVector - selection!: the new selection
        BBjNumber - force: notify the other components of a mandatory selection change with no option to veto

        BBjNumber canDrive: 0 = change of selection denied, 1 = change of selection allowed
